ossj.qos.ri.pm.testclient
Class PmClient

java.lang.Object
  ossj.qos.ri.pm.testclient.PmClient
public class PmClient
extends java.lang.Object

Simple test client for pms. Handles and controls a user interface from which it is possible to define and create a simple pm.

Author:
Henrik Lindstrom, Ericsson
See Also:
ossj.qos.ri.pm.pm.adapter

getInstance

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Starts the client. Makes a connection to the pm monitor session EJB. Then tries to create a pm.

Parameters:
args - first argument should be the path and file name for a property file with information about how to connect to app. server. If not present, then default values will be used(WebLogic on localhost).
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException
